name: Facebook Theme Kill Ads Original by @hackkercinnta
description:
Facebook Theme Kill Ads Original by @hackkercinnta

To increase the speed of loading, add the following script at the end of the script "}"

*script

#NB:
Replace the "{" with "<" and "}" with ">"
